# Setup 

```{r setup}
# assumes you have client JSON saved to environment argument GAR_CLIENT_JSON
app_project <- googleAuthR::gar_set_client(
  scopes = c("https://www.googleapis.com/auth/cloud-platform"))

library(googleCloudAutoMLTablesR)

googleAuthR::gar_auth("gc.oauth")
```

Test authentication and check in correct project: 

```{r}
# assumes you have projectId string set to environment 
#argument AMLTR_PROJECT_ID
projectId = Sys.getenv("AMLTR_PROJECT_ID")

## Get list of locations 
amlt_locations <- amltr_list_locations(projectId = projectId)

amlt_locations$locations

amlt_location <- amlt_locations$locations$name[1]
```

## Get list of datasets 
```{r}
amlt_datasets <- amltr_list_datasets(parent = amlt_location)

amlt_datasets$datasets[, c("displayName", "createTime", "etag", "name")]
```

# Loading data into AutoML Tables 

## Create dataset 

```{r}
# https://stackoverflow.com/questions/7799591/creating-tuples-from-two-vectors
dataset <- Dataset(displayName = "test02",
                   tablesDatasetMetadata = TablesDatasetMetadata())

gcat_create_dataset(Dataset = dataset,
                    parent = amlt_location)
```
